Class DataBaseAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataBaseAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataBase
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooksDataBase, UsersDataBase

    public abstract class DataBaseAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBase
    The DataBaseAbstract class is an intermediate class for other database classes

    The DataBaseAbstract class implements all the methods of DataBase interface,so that to ease the implementation of the subclasses It also declares am abstract function for validation of the database's Record

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.io.File file
      Associated file used as a database
      protected int NUMBER_OF_FIELDS
      The value is used to store number of fields of the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataBaseAbstract(java.lang.String fileName, int numberOfFields)
      Opens a file specified by the first argument as a database,sets number of fields of the database to the second argument Creates a file with the name specified by the first argument,if the file does not exists

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataBaseAbstract

        public DataBaseAbstract(java.lang.String fileName,
                        int numberOfFields)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Opens a file specified by the first argument as a database,sets number of fields of the database to the second argument Creates a file with the name specified by the first argument,if the file does not exists
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to be used as a database
        numberOfFields - Nuber of fields in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if numberOfFields <= 0 or the file does not exists and could not be created

        Parameters:
        record - The Record to be checked
        Returns:
        true on success and false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if out of range field is tryied to be accessed
